valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Wed 1 Oct 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Thu 2 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: Low 450 miles southwest of Iceland 983 expected just north of Iceland 980 by 1800 Wednesday. New high expected just west of Trafalgar 1025 by same time

Wind
Southeasterly, veering southerly, 6 to gale 8.

Moderate or rough, occasionally very rough later.
Weather
Showers then rain at times.
Visibility
Good, becoming moderate or poor.
